quotes.t: But, alas, I know the real me, the me with the soft, round stomach and the love handles, {qword}odious{/qword} first cousins to the paunch.
Two of them—his mother Livia and his {qword}odious{/qword} sister Janice—were at heart killers like himself.

He learned an important lesson some years ago in Panama. Manuel Antonio Noriega was too {qword}odious{/qword} even for Carter, who shunned the Panamanian strongman in the run-up to the 1989 ballot there.
